tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CitizenshipLaws (
	citizenship_id INT NOT NULL,
	country_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	law_description TEXT,
	law_date DATE,
	PRIMARY KEY (citizenship_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CitizenshipRegulations (
	regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
	citizenship_id INT NOT NULL,
	regulation_text TEXT,
	regulation_date DATE,
	PRIMARY KEY (regulation_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (citizenship_id) REFERENCES CitizenshipLaws(citizenship_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceTracking (
	tracking_id INT NOT NULL,
	regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
	compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
	compliance_date DATE,
	PRIMARY KEY (tracking_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES CitizenshipRegulations(regulation_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Citizens (   citizen_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   name VARCHAR(50),   country VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE Laws (   law_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   title VARCHAR(100),   description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE Regulations (   regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   law_id INT,   start_date DATE,   end_date DATE,   FOREIGN KEY (law_id) REFERENCES Laws(law_id) );

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (   record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   citizen_id INT,   regulation_id INT,   compliance_status BOOLEAN,   FOREIGN KEY (citizen_id) REFERENCES Citizens(citizen_id),   FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES Regulations(regulation_id) );
CREATE TABLE Violations (   violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   record_id INT,   violation_description TEXT,   violation_date DATE,   FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES ComplianceRecords(record_id) );
